title: Apple Seeds Second iPadOS 15.1 Release Candidate for iPad Mini 6
content:
Apple today seeded a second release candidate version of iPadOS 15.1 to developers for testing purposes, with the update coming just a few days released the first RC. This RC is only available to those who have an iPad mini 6, and there is no accompanying iOS 15.1 RC 2.


Registered developers can download the iPadOS 15 RC from the Apple Developer Center, and once the profile is installed, beta updates will be available over the air.

The release candidate version of iPadOS 15.1 is are the versions that will be provided to the public when iPadOS 15.1 sees an official release next week.
Related Roundups: iOS 15, iPadOS 15
Related Forum: iOS 15

This article, "Apple Seeds Second iPadOS 15.1 Release Candidate for iPad Mini 6" first appeared on MacRumors.com
